channel.title: NEED HELP WITH ::Commands
channel.description: i tried to make a commands list, but when i type ingame ::commands, nothing shows up.

item.title: NEED HELP WITH ::Commands
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’m assuming this is for a base such as deltascape, or something similiar. To make a command find ‘customCommand’ in client class. Then follow this layout:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands") {
sM("::command1 ::command2 ::command 3");
sM("::command4 ::command5 ::command6"); // could be sendMessage
// etc
}

Or you could use a scroll interference and put it inside a method and call it in the command e.g

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands") {
methodForScroll();
}

Read full topic
